pages.title: Quest Book
pages.text: Your quest book will become your best friend. Quests are typically sequential and build on each other.$(br2)Assign a Hotkey to your quest book: $(li)Open: Menu$(li)Go to: Controls...$(li)Then: Key Binds$(li)And search: "quests".

pages.title: Find a Village
pages.text: Finding a village early on is a great way to start out. In a village all of your basic needs are easily obtained: food, shelter, and a bed! Once you find a village, start $(l:videos_farms)farming$(/l).
